title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Product name: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors.

- Working principle: Ultrasonic vibration and buzzer pulse. The device sends sound/vibration every 30 seconds to disturb snakes and other animals. Frequency about 400 ± 100 Hz.
- Power: Solar-powered. No battery change needed in normal sun condition. Please turn switch ON and put in sun 4–5 hours before first use for full charge.
- Coverage: Up to about 7,000 sq ft per unit in open ground. Actual range may change with soil type, terrain, and obstacles. For best effect, place multiple units to overlap coverage.
- Material and durability: Premium material, waterproof rating IP44. Suitable for outdoor garden, yard, farm. Designed for long use in weather.
- Safety: Chemical free. Safe for children and pets when installed correctly. No poison.
- Target animals: Made for snakes. Also helps to repel some other animals like deer, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, squirrels. Results can vary by species and environment.
- Time to see effect: Usually 2–4 weeks of continuous use. Some animals need time to change their path.

How to use:
1) Before first time, turn the device ON and place under sun for 4–5 hours to charge.
2) Install the stake so the top part stays about 2 inches above the soil. Do not hammer hard; make a pilot hole if ground is very hard.
3) Place units around the area you want to protect. Keep distance so their ranges overlap. Avoid blocking by walls or very dense bushes.
4) Keep the solar panel clean for best charging. Wipe dust and leaves.
5) The device will emit pulses automatically every 30 seconds.

Tips:
- Wet, dense soil conducts vibration better than dry, sandy soil.
- Do not submerge in water. IP44 protects from splashes and rain only.
- In cold or weak sunlight, charging time may be longer.
- For large yards, use more than one unit to remove blind spots.

Included: 4 repellent units. Ready to install after charging.
